sentences.name: Anna
sentences.sentence: Welcome home! Will! How's your day?

sentences.name: Will
sentences.sentence: Well it’s okay i guess, i got tipped by the client so that’s a plus.

sentences.name: Anna
sentences.sentence: Anyway what do you want to eat for today?

sentences.name: Anna
sentences.sentence: And Look at this !!! Chloe gives us lots of fruits!
